actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Transportation to approve a project for the construction of an acoustical barrier along a portion of the Interstate System in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania and to increase the Federal share of such project.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to enter into an agreement with the State highway department of the State of Pennsylvania for the construction of a second acoustical barrier along a specified portion of Route 95 of the Interstate System in Philadelphia. Stipulates that the Federal share of such project shall be 100 percent of its cost.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Transportation to approve a project for the construction of an acoustical barrier along a portion of the Interstate System in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania and to increase the Federal share of such project.
